text: Maggie Peterson Mancuso (January 10, 1941 â€“ May 15, 2022) was an American television actress and singer. She was best known for playing Charlene Darling]on The Andy Griffith Show. She was a location manager for movies, and worked in the production of the 1995 movie Casino. Peterson was born in Greeley, Colorado. Peterson died on May 15, 2022 at her home in Colorado at the age of 81. ==References== Category:1941 births Category:2022 deaths Category:American television actors Category:Singers from Colorado Category:Actors from Colorado
title: Maggie Peterson
